mapper.select: SELECT rno ,mno , mid , mname , issue , joindate , joindate jointime FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rno , mno , mid , mname , issue , joindate FROM (SELECT mno , mid , mname , issue , joindate FROM member WHERE isshow = 'Y' AND GRADE = 'M' AND mid = #{avo.mid} AND mname = #{avo.mname} ORDER BY mno desc ) ) WHERE rno BETWEEN #{page.startCont} AND #{page.endCont}
